typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		reviewerID as string,
		asin as string,
		reviewerName as string,
		helpful as string[],
		reviewText as string,
		overall as double,
		summary as string,
		unixReviewTime as string,
		reviewTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source foldDown(unroll(helpful),
	mapColumn(
		reviewerID,
		asin,
		reviewerName,
		helpful,
		reviewText,
		overall,
		summary,
		unixReviewTime,
		reviewTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(input(
		product_id as integer,
		reviewer_ID as string,
		reviewer_Name as string,
		helpful as integer,
		reviewText as string,
		overall as double,
		summary as string,
		unixReviewTime as integer,
		reviewTime as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		product_id = asin,
		reviewer_ID = reviewerID,
		reviewer_Name = reviewerName,
		helpful,
		reviewText,
		overall,
		summary,
		unixReviewTime,
		reviewTime
	),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
